name: VTree Beach Volleyball
description: Choose from 37 international teams an 13 different courts from around the world as you pass, assist, attack, block and dig your way to the championships and bring home the trophy for your country. Special features exclusive for Steam members.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 700 MB available space
